page.title: 11SHOPPING IN NEWTOWN AREA
page.content: The only shop in the area is also a Post Office and Newsagency; it sells groceries, greengroceries, coal and advertsising space. It is one focal point in the community. Newspapers are delivered daily but in some parts milk is every other day. The milkman will also deliver bread, eggs and some other products. The butcher,fishmonger and baker do make calls in some parts of the area. From a small survey it seems that it is mainly the elderly who make full use of the local shop and their weekly grocery order is delivered. The majority use it for small items but do their weekly shopping in supermarkets in Fareham or Waterlooville. Clothes and durable goods are mainly bought in the larger towns, a few families use mail order catalogues. Farm shops are very popular for fresh food.
